roleset.name: attached tightly, constricting physically

example.name: Within CXN
example.text: Poor girl said the dress was so binding she had trouble breathing and sitting down.
example.arg: [so] , [she had trouble breathing and sitting down.]

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Verbnet entries 9.8 and 22.3-2-1, no relevant FN entry for this sense of adjective. Loosely based on verb entry, but it seems the adjective only has one arg: the instrument of binding.

roleset.name: executed with proper legal authority

role.descr: whom contract, law binds, usually "on" phrase

example.name: All args
example.text: The arbitrator's decision shall be final and binding on both parties.

example.name: Arg0 only, typical usage
example.text: The next day , the old council make another scene trying to get into their old offices , claiming that the vote was illegal and not binding , and that they were going to their offices to work as if nothing happened .

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire.
